content:
From: Jaap Boender <jaapb@kerguelen.org>
Hi list,

I'm trying to get Isabelle running under NetBSD with the Linux emulation
layer (at first I thought to compile a native version, but after the
mails about FreeBSD on the -dev mailing list a few months ago I figured
that might not be terribly wise); I've got things to the point where
jEdit shows up, but the Isabelle plugin doesn't load and gives the error
printed below instead. The problem seems to be that the Linux emulation
under NetBSD doesn't support epoll.

Is there any way to disable the particular Isabelle component that
generates this error, or get around the problem in any other way?

Thanks,

Jaap

--- error: ---

plugin isabelle.jedit.Plugin
